name: Firefight!
description:
Firefight! is a fast-paced, one-player arcade game where the player must navigate burning buildings in order to put out fires and rescue trapped hostages. It’s a lot like the classic arcade maze runners of the 80s, but with colorful, high-resolution, hand-drawn art.

The Story


The year is 21XX. The evil Flame Gang is terrorizing the city of Neo Alva, trapping hostages within burning buildings. In response, Duck the fire-fighting robot is sent in to rescue the hostages and extinguish the threat of the Flame Gang once and for all!

Key Features


  • 25 fast-paced levels!
  • In addition to regular gameplay, players will have to master door-and-switch puzzles, light-switch puzzles, and water flow levels. Players will also have to manage toxic waste that makes enemies even more powerful if left untreated.
  • Side challenges and unlockable achievements throughout the game, to reward the most skilled players.
  • An all-original soundtrack, composed by veteran jazz musician Max Ridgway!

With its simple story and intuitive controls, anyone can pick up Firefight!
